landing.bio: Passionate programmer with an entrepreneurial mindset. Enjoy learning new emerging technologies and applications in the real world. Experienced Engineer with a demonstrated history of working in specialized financial services and technology. Skilled in Python, C++, JavaScript, and web development. Interested in Fin-Tech, IoT, Payment Services, Financial Services, Crypto-currency, Blockchain, Logistics, and Stock Market. Learn, Share and Inspire.

experience.aboutWork: Collaborating with Front-end, Back-end, Integration, DevOps, and Core Infrastructure Software Engineers to problem-solve critical software production issues such as Vault API, HTTP, SFTP, TCP Proxy, and native iOS/Android SDKs. Implementing, maintaining, and enhancing automated migration tools in Python to process over 1 million card data monthly, improving overall migration process and performance by 50%. Executing complex data integrations with VGS solutions, debugging custom operation codes, and YAML configurations to ensure sensitive payment data are securely tokenized and card issuers remain PCI compliant. Upholding ongoing expert knowledge of diverse technologies, leading a task force to create technical articles on resolving product issues and troubleshooting, resulting in 20% reduction of incoming tickets.

Designed, implemented, and maintained Enterprise Architecture Kanban boards in Jira development, stage, and production environment to expedite review process, increased 20% efficiency across all departments. Collaborated with Application Engineer Specialists to develop automated transitions, fields update, email assignments, conditions, and validations of project workflows in Groovy using Script Runner. Developed and implemented custom fields using JavaScript in Jira projects to create real-time synchronization between BMC Remedy ITSM tool and Salesforce SRM ticketing system. Analyzed system database, developed application models, and generated interactive reports using MicroStrategy BI for monthly and quarterly dashboards.

Applied images, installed software, and configured devices for over 200 deployments of staff and faculty. Troubleshot, diagnosed, resolved daily issues (desktop applications, workstations, and configuration problems) in a timely manner with limited disruptions across 3 university campuses. Maintained confidentiality and integrity of information residing on clientsâ€™ systems as well as their physical security. Collaborated with Support Engineers to maintain over 490 computers in Digital Learning Center labs.

experience.organization: DAB X (Social Media Online Shop provides: Authentic | High-Quality | Luxurious | Limited Edition | Super Rare - Clothing and Footwear)
experience.aboutWork: Conducted retail activities such as prepared business strategies, managed inventory, implemented marketing activities, fulfilled and shipped online orders. Acted as the primary point of contact for customers including orders, order inquiries, shipping inquiries, returns, and complaints. Managed online store revenue including cash handling and ensured an accurate to all payment processing and refunds.

Worked closely with IT department manager and provided on-site technical support to students and professors. Resolved hardware and software issues such as operating system configuration, password reset, and printer hook-ups.

Collaborated in an Agile development ecosystem to develop, test, deploy end-to-end web application, such as new software releases, bug fixes, feature enhancements, application optimizations, and documentation updates. Supported Mobile Application Engineers in planning, designing, developing, and implementing a high-performance user-friendly mobile application in Java. Implemented internal automated tools to optimize manual task execution across a wide variety of projects.

education.major: Computer Science with minor Business Management

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.aboutProject: Design, develop, and test a dynamic, mobile friendly, and multi-browser compatible personal website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJS, Bootstrap, and jQuery. Utilize GitHub Student Developer Pack to deploy and host React Application with custom domain name.

projects.title: AI Pac Man
projects.aboutProject: Implemented various AI techniques such as DFS, BFS, UCS, A*, alpha-beta pruning, minimax, expectimax, MDP, and Q-learning for the game of Pac-Man. Designed strategies for the agents to play a multi-player capture-the-flag variant of Pacman.

projects.title: Solving Classification and Regression Problems Using Machine and Deep Learning
projects.aboutProject: Collaborated in a team of four to analyze datasets from Scikit-learn library with linear regression, multivariate regression, decision tree, SVM and multi-layer perception classifier. Analyzed and generated ad-hoc reports with Jupyter Notebook and Latex

projects.title: Memory allocation and memory free operation
projects.aboutProject: The allocation and free operations will be made against an initially empty fixed sized free memory pool. The program must support three allocation policies: First fit linked list, Best fit linked list, Buddy system power of 2 block allocation (using a minimum allocation of 32 bytes)
